TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ji’an, title = Ji’an, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ji’an} }

S.FORM: Ji'an mki sku Hualien. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 62.65 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0.68 km²), 78,633 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 29,613 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 14,299 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 18%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis, Truku ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. sinpngan sehu s'uli sku sahuy go. ays ptyaw sebu Ji'an ays psgayun 18 ru 23 alang. 23 alang hani ga, Natawran , Pukpuk , Lidaw , Mabuwakay , Cikasuwan , Isaetipan pahikukian , Isawalian pahikukian , Taracan , Citekudan , Cikeliwan , Atonan , Ciripunan , Sarad , Kungkung , Hacining , Fulufuluan , gnaalu , mkibuhw , kiyumi , miyamay , Buner , Sirakesay , Ciyibangcalay .

Ji'an mki sko Hoalien. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 62.65 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0.68 km²), 78,633 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 29,613 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 14,299 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 18%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Amis, Troko ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. sinpngan seho s'oli sko sahoy go. ays ptyaw sebo Ji'an ays psgayon 18 ro 23 alang. 23 alang hani ga, Natawran , Pokpok , Lidaw , Mabowakay , Cikasowan , Isaetipan pahikokian , Isawalian pahikokian , Taracan , Citekodan , Cikeliwan , Atonan , Ciriponan , Sarad , Kongkong , Hacining , Folofoloan , gnaalo , mkibohw , kiyomi , miyamay , Boner , Sirakesay , Ciyibangcalay .
